Name: Kooning van Siam
Review Text: This is literally one of the best restaurants I have ever been to in regards to authenticity and flavor. Very well put together dishes with an explosion of flavor per bite. Absolutely worth the visit when your in town. The curry chicken was Absolutely amazing! I had to go twice.

Name: Kooning van Siam
Review Text: I've not had Thai food this good in 10 years. Very humble restaurant, quiet, but delicious food.  The service could be better, but overall totally worth the time and money.  Definitely recommend for great Thai food!

Name: Kooning van Siam
Review Text: I was very surprised about the quality of the food. We chose something at random and realized how quiet it was inside, which often makes me worry. Worry not, the food was amazing. We sat right next to the kitchen and had full view of everything being cooked freshly. I would highly recommend.

Review Text: Very good and delicous food and similar to our hometown. It reminds me of food from my mom and grandma. Great services and cosy place.

Name: Kooning van Siam
Review Text: A very good small restaurant. The menu is relatively limited, but the dishes are very tasty and reasonably priced.

Name: Kooning van Siam
Review Text: The food was authentic Thai food. Service was very friendly. The restaurant is decorated with many artifacts bought from Thailand. The owner Jan is very helpful and friendly.
